meanings.definition: A foreign crystal found within an igneous rock.
meanings.sent1: The xenocryst sparkled brightly in the rock.
meanings.sent2: Geologists study xenocrysts to understand the history of rocks.
meanings.sent3: The xenocryst decided to take a vacation in the igneous rock.
meanings.sent4: The xenocryst stood out like a diamond in the rough.
meanings.sent5: The xenocryst was like a colorful guest at a dull party.

meanings.definition: A crystal that is not native to the rock in which it is found.
meanings.sent1: Miners were surprised to discover a xenocryst in the rock.
meanings.sent2: The xenocryst seemed out of place among the other crystals.
meanings.sent3: The xenocryst told jokes to entertain the native crystals.
meanings.sent4: Her presence was a xenocryst in the monotony of his life.
meanings.sent5: The xenocryst shone like a star in the night sky of rocks.
